capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry's belongings include a wand. I'm quite certain about that, and I think it's a pretty well-known fact in the wizarding world.
capsules_submitted.reply: if you don't mind me asking. what is harry's gender?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is a male. I'm pretty sure about that. He's definitely a guy, you know?
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what does harry look like?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm telling you, Harry's forehead is literally covered in this weird lightning-shaped cut. It's so precise and clean, like someone carved it out with a scalpel. I've never seen anything like it before.

I've seen some pretty intense injuries in my time, but that lightning-shaped cut on Harry's forehead is something else. I'm not sure what happened to him, but it's clear he was in a world of trouble. The certainty level on this one is high for me - I'm almost positive I saw the whole thing go down.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what kind of character is valeria?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon's been growing that beard for ages, and it's really starting to accumulate. I'm pretty sure he's not even thinking about trimming it anymore!
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. what character is associated with the accumulation of a beard?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is indeed an adult, and I can confirm that. He's been around for a while, and his age shows it.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what is the export of snape?

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's a great guy, and I think it's well-known that he's a male.
capsules_submitted.reply: let me ask you something. what kind of enchantment does hagrid cast?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been told that Filch is actually the title of the school administrator. I'm pretty sure that's correct, he's definitely in charge of keeping an eye on us students at Hogwarts.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am curious. filch, who is the person that this attribute belongs to?

capsules_submitted.utterance: I've met Hagrid a few times, and I have to say, he's definitely one of the tallest people in our school. I mean, he towers over most of the professors, let alone students like me! (laughs) The way he moves around the castle is quite impressive, considering his size.
capsules_submitted.reply: i just learned something, valeria, i have to say, i've never heard of someone being called "surprisingly tall" before   that's a new one! tell me more about this person.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid does look pretty tall for a half-giant, doesn't he? I mean, I've seen him towering over the rest of us in the Great Hall. It's one thing to hear about his size from books and stories, but seeing it firsthand is a different story altogether. He really does seem surprisingly-tall when you're standing next to him.
capsules_submitted.reply: i have heard this before. valeria told me that hagrid is quite tall.
